edge_1: The release dates of Avengers: Infinity War (May 4, 2018) and Avengers: Endgame (May 3, 2019) were announced by Marvel Studios in October 2014.
edge_2: Announcement made by Marvel Studios in October 2014 for the production of Avengers: Infinity War and Avengers: Endgame.

edge_1: In early March 2018, Disney moved the release of Infinity War in the United States to April 27, 2018, to have it be released the same weekend as some of its international markets.
edge_2: In early March 2018, Disney moved the release of Infinity War in the United States to April 27, 2018.

edge_1: Chris Evans, who portrays Steve Rogers / Captain America in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, returns to his role for Avengers: Infinity War.
edge_2: In early March 2018, Disney moved the release of Infinity War in the United States to April 27, 2018, to have it be released the same weekend as some of its international markets.

edge_1: Chris Evans, who portrays Steve Rogers / Captain America in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, returns to his role for Avengers: Infinity War.
edge_2: With an estimated budget in the range of $325–400 million, Infinity War is one of the most expensive films ever made.
